item.title: System Security
item.description: Malware/Virus Prevention If you operate a device for your home or business and are concerned about malware/virus activity I provide solutions that can protect you in the follow areas of system security: User awareness, User behavior, and preventative security software. Service Price $85 Malware/Virus Removal If you think you may have already become a victim of a malware or virus infection I offer a cleaning service that provides a quick turn around, comprehensive report, and after support.
